name: Flying Sea Stunts 3D
description:
Flying Sea Stunts 3D is an awesome new 3D Simulation game, pilot a Sea Plane . Ever wanted to fly a seaplane? This game is perfect for you! Now you can float your flying boat in the ocean or fly your airplane in islands. Feel like a professional aircraft flight pilot! You are free in a world that you can do what you want.
Features:
- Land your floatplane on water
- Improve Airplane Flight Skills
- Stunning HD Graphics
- Beautiful Mountains and islands
- Advanced airplane flight physics
- Easy and Free to use.
